data.title: World Editions
data.text:
Special London event with Lucie Rico and her translator Daria Chernysheva, 30 June!

Don’t miss this London event to launch Rico’s novel Fowl Eulogies, published in English translation by World Editions at UCL on 30 June! In this ‘dazzling first novel of malice and feathers’ (Elle)...

Continue reading

Ian McEwan praises Marijke Schermer’s Breakwater, just published in English translation

This spring saw publication of acclaimed Dutch author Marijke Schermer’s Breakwater, translated into English by Liz Waters Ian McEwan has called it an ‘excellent novel.’ He describes it as ‘Packed...

Second London event with Pilar Quintana in conversation with Julianne Pachico at Burley Fisher books

We’re excited to announce a second London event with National-Book Award nominated author Pilar Quintana. She’ll be in conversation with Julianne Pachico talking about her new novel, Abyss, at Burley...

Continue reading

Chinese author Zhang Yueran to visit UK in May 2023 with her translator Jeremy Tiang

Described by Ian McEwan as ‘ a triumph’ , this story of friendship, trauma, family secrets and the aftermath of the Cultural Revolution caught the imagination of reviewers and readers everywhere. Y...

Continue reading

Pilar Quintana, author of Abyss, visits the UK, June 2023

Colombian author Pilar Quintana, shortlisted for the National Book Award for her novel The Bitch, will be in the UK in May and June to launch her new novel, Abyss, translated from the Spanish by Lisa ...

Continue reading

Maryse Condé travels to Sarcelles, Paris to celebrate a school named in her honour: Lycée Maryse Condé

The Lycée in Sarcelles, a suburb of northern Paris, has honoured World Editions author Maryse Condé by renaming the school after her. Maryse travelled to France on 20 January to take part in the open...

Continue reading

Rodaan Al-Galidi at Cheltenham Literature Festival

Ian McEwan praises Zhang Yueran’s upcoming novel Cocoon

Thank you to Ian McEwan for this stunning endorsement of Cocoon, to be published in October! “Cocoon is a stupendous novel, a beautiful and formidable achievement on the grandest scale. Its ruthles...

Claudia Petrucci’s The Performance praised by the Literary Review

Rodaan Al Galidi and Marijke Schermer to appear at the Cheltenham Literature Festival, October 2022
